sentences.sContent: I even moved to Utah to be with him.
sentences.sContent_eng: I even moved to Utah to be with him.
sentences.sCn: 我甚至搬到了犹他州，为了和他在一起。

sentences.sContent: A government "sanitation" team uses heavy equipment, including bulldozers and cranes, to remove all traces of the A-12 spy plane from a 1963 crash site in the Utah desert.
sentences.sContent_eng: A government "sanitation" team uses heavy equipment, including bulldozers and cranes, to remove all traces of the A-12 spy plane from a 1963 crash site in the Utah desert.
sentences.sCn: 一个政府“清理”团队使用推土机和起重机等重型设备从1963年A-12间谍飞机在美国犹他州沙漠的失事地点抹去所有痕迹。

sentences.sContent: "I know of a well in Utah that lost its original capacity after a couple years, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I know of a well in Utah that lost its original capacity after a couple years, " he said.
sentences.sCn: “我知道在犹他州在短短的几年时间里，一口井就失去了最初的容量，”他说。

phrases.pCn: 犹他爵士队（美国篮球队）
